thread.title: Here’s how Bernie Sanders told comedian Bill Maher he would pay for his plans
thread.title_full: Here’s how Bernie Sanders told comedian Bill Maher he would pay for his plans - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Here’s how Bernie Sanders told comedian Bill Maher he would pay for his plans
text: Presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders said Friday night that he could pay for his expansive agenda by raising taxes on a group not much larger than the country’s wealthiest 1 percent. The senator from Vermont assessment came during a broadcast of HBO’s " Real Time with Bill Maher. " Maher, a comedian and political commentator, said repeatedly that […] ...
